responsibilities: Developed an application to make scanned Iranian historical newspapers searchable using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
Converted scanned archives into machine-readable text to enhance research accessibility.
Implemented full-text and semantic search for intuitive document retrieval.
Created graph-based search to explore document relationships through visualizations.
Built a chatbot assistant for natural language queries to simplify archive exploration.
Designed a custom Agentic Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solution for reliable data access via chatbot.
Fine-tuned Large Language Models to enhance semantic search, question answering, and function calling.
Automated large-scale data collection with web scraping tools across 50+ sources.
Built a data warehouse reducing reporting time by 70% as sole data scientist.
Designed scalable ETL pipelines integrating data from over 11 sources.
Created dashboards delivering actionable insights for marketing, finance, and operations teams.
Improved BC Data Catalogue search precision by 25% and recall by 40% with a new semantic search system.
Created topic modeling solutions with interactive visualizations enhancing user experience.
Earned two awards for project presentation and recognition on UBC's website.
Automated data scraping pipelines to extract structured and unstructured data from over 40 sources.
Optimized ETL pipelines improving data processing efficiency by 20%.
